content: I don't have access to city-specific information such as the timeline for when the electric buses and maintenance vehicles are going to be on the road. however, you can reach out to your city government to inquire about that. they will be in a better position to provide an update on this. implementing electric buses and maintenance vehicles is a major undertaking, and there could be a timeframe for phasing them out over time. so, keep in touch with your city government to learn more about their sustainability efforts and updates on the electric fleet roll-out plan.
